WorkItem.Description:
I was going to use the optimizer for bear, and I checked of a lot of items.
But when I started it, it just finished in 1 sec, and I got the message that it couldn't find any gear (or something like that).
When I pressed "OK" I got this error/debug thingy:
 
See the end of this message for details on invoking 
just-in-time (JIT) debugging instead of this dialog box.
 
************** Exception Text **************
System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object.
at Rawr.CalculationsBear.GetCharacterCalculations(Character character, Item additionalItem)
at Rawr.CalculationsBase.GetCharacterCalculations(Character character)
at Rawr.Calculations.GetCharacterCalculations(Character character)
at Rawr.FormOptimize._worker_RunWorkerCompleted(Object sender, RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs e)
at System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.OnRunWorkerCompleted(RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs e)
at System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.AsyncOperationCompleted(Object arg)

Comments.Message: Please send us your character file.

Here is my bear profile.
I saved it right before I started selcting items for the optimizer.
Err... What items you selected for the optimizer is what's important. If you can reproduce this, please send us the character file it reproduces with.

Hmm, then I'm not sure what character file you mean.
I can't save all the items I checked, can I?

And I dont really remember which one I checked either :(
Err, yes? What items you mark available are saved with the character.

The file I attached here has all the optimizer items saved.
It loads them all on my PC at least.
